pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.1.46: _Jānāhi_. This verb, which normally means “to understand” or “to find out,” is used quite broadly in the Pali canon.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:2.4.5: I am unable to make sense of the phrasing in the non-offense clause (_sāmikā codetvā denti_), and I therefore translate according to the phrasing in the commentary, “After prompting by the owners, it is given;” _sāmikehi codetvā dinne_, see [](Kkh. 119.6).
